projects.title: Bwabah ElDar
projects.shortDescription: Bawabet Al Dar is a leading real estate platform in the United Arab Emirates, dedicated to helping users find the best residential and commercial properties. The website offers a wide range of apartments, villas, lands, and investment opportunities across the UAE, with up-to-date listings, detailed property information, and an easy-to-use search experience.

projects.title: Lernova Elearning Website
projects.shortDescription: Learnova is a comprehensive online learning platform built to help learners unlock their full potential. We offer a wide range of high-quality online courses across multiple disciplines, created by experienced instructors and industry professionals. Each course focuses on practical, real-world skills that you can apply immediately to grow your career or start a new path.At Learnova, we believe learning should be flexible and accessible. That’s why our platform allows you to learn at your own pace, from anywhere in the world, with lifetime access to course content and a smooth, user-friendly experience. Whether you’re a student, a professional, or someone looking to develop new skills, Learnova gives you the tools, knowledge, and confidence to succeed in today’s competitive digital world.

projects.title: ClickMart
projects.shortDescription: Kanban-style task manager with drag-and-drop interaction.

projects.title: Wearly
projects.shortDescription: Wearly is where timeless elegance meets modern femininity.A high-end destination for women who appreciate refined fashion, elevated details, and effortless luxury.From statement pieces to everyday essentials, Wearly curates premium clothing and accessories designed to empower confidence, celebrate individuality, and redefine sophistication. Each piece is thoughtfully selected to reflect quality, style, and a passion for fashion that goes beyond trends.

projects.title: Jumia Website
projects.shortDescription: This project is an e-commerce website inspired by the Jumia platform. It represents my first web development project built using Bootstrap and CSS. The main goal of this project was to understand the fundamentals of front-end development and practice building responsive layouts using the Bootstrap framework.The website includes a modern design, organized sections, and reusable components that simulate a real online shopping experience. Through this project, I focused on improving my skills in HTML structure, CSS styling, and responsive design principles. This project marks an important step in my journey as a web developer.
